item.title: VFC
item.description: score:33 Chances: VF Corp. operates through multiple segments including Outdoor, Active, Work, and Other, offering a diverse range of products in the apparel and footwear industry.The company’s brands like Vans and The North Face are well-known and have a strong market presence.The recent cyberattack may lead to increased cybersecurity measures and potential improvements in IT infrastructure.
